com.ae.apps.lib.api.contacts

Interface ContactsApiGateway

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractContactsApiGateway, ContactsApiGatewayImpl

    public interface ContactsApiGateway
    An Abstraction over the Android Contacts API

    Requires the below permission in the manifest

    android.permission.READ_CONTACTS

    Usage: First call one of the initialize methods and after the contacts are read, use any other method to perform an operation on the

    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<ContactInfo> getAllContacts()
      Return the list of contacts that were read by the API based on the Options used with the initialize method.
      java.lang.String getContactIdFromAddress(java.lang.String address)
      Convert an address into corresponding contactId
      java.lang.String getContactIdFromRawContact(java.lang.String rawContactId)
      Convert a rawContactId into the corresponding contactId
      ContactInfo getContactInfo(java.lang.String contactId)
      Returns a contact based on the contactId
      ContactInfo getContactInfo(java.lang.String contactId, ContactInfoOptions options)
      Returns a contact based on the contactId and options
      ContactInfo getRandomContact()
      Return a Random contact from the contacts that have been read by the API
      long getReadContactsCount()
      Get the count of read contacts
      void initialize(ContactInfoFilterOptions options)
      Initialize the ContactsApi to read all contacts based on the options provided
      void initializeAsync(ContactInfoFilterOptions options, ContactsDataConsumer dataConsumer)
      Initialize the ContactApi to read all contacts based on the options provided in a separate thread.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(ContactInfoFilterOptions options)
        Initialize the ContactsApi to read all contacts based on the options provided
        Parameters:
        options - filter options

      • initializeAsync

        void initializeAsync(ContactInfoFilterOptions options,
                     ContactsDataConsumer dataConsumer)
        Initialize the ContactApi to read all contacts based on the options provided in a separate thread. The data consumer would be notified when the operation is complete
        Parameters:
        options - filter options
        dataConsumer - data consumer

      • getAllContacts

        java.util.List<ContactInfo> getAllContacts()
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Return the list of contacts that were read by the API based on the Options used with the initialize method.

        Make sure one of the below methods before invoking this method com.ae.apps.lib.api.contacts.ContactsApiGateway#initialize(com.ae.apps.lib.api.contacts.types.ContactInfoFilterOptions) com.ae.apps.lib.api.contacts.ContactsApiGateway#initializeAsync(com.ae.apps.lib.api.contacts.types.ContactInfoFilterOptions, com.ae.apps.lib.api.contacts.types.ContactsDataConsumer)

        Returns:
        list of read contacts
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the API is not yet initialized

      • getReadContactsCount

        long getReadContactsCount()
        Get the count of read contacts
        Returns:
        the number of contacts that were read

      • getRandomContact

        ContactInfo getRandomContact()
                      throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Return a Random contact from the contacts that have been read by the API
        Returns:
        a random contact from the contacts that are read by the API, null if there are no contacts
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the API is not yet initialized
